data.text: @enews I’m glad he spoke out - but worry that some will think it’s too late - however they did work together about what she was going to say and that he is very apologetic about the crash - love both of them and hope to see more of them together in films

@enews #Filmmaking Essentials: Sexual Violence, Hollywood's Boy's Club, Stalkers, & the #NewHollywoodGeneration https://t.co/61IQThpr2c #NewHollywoodGeneration #HollywoodUnapologetic Please watch and share #SupportIndieFilm #WomeninFilm #IndieFilm #MeToo #HollywoodDiversity https://t.co/OPId5tj7qZ
@enews I love both of them an respect their work and admire both of them as people! I really hope that they will still do Kill Bill Vol 3! ❤️❤️🙌🏽🤩🤩🙏🏽
@enews This makes me happy that I'm a fan of his films because he did the right thing in supporting his coworkers
